title: Unbranded Juicy Crittoure 8-Ounce Coif Fur Moisturizing Conditioner
description: It's what puts the fluff in fluffy a conditioning treatment that creates the most pettable furs in town. After shampooing, rinse, apply conditioner and massage into wet coat. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. For best results, use with Juicy Crittoure Shampooch. Discontinue use if skin becomes irritated. If symptoms persist, consult your veterinarian.
